item.title: KLA CORP 10-K
item.description: KLA CORP, which is in the Optical Instruments & Lenses [3827] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 06, 2021 had 44791 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 30 - 413 instances june - 397 instances financial - 323 instances 2021 - 309 instances tax - 303 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
